response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be equally beneficial to you. Considering its worth to both parties, I propose a transaction price of $14,000. This offer strikes a balance between reflecting the product's true value and ensuring a fair deal for you. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits us both.", "product_price": 14000}
